Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I have a question regarding some strange behaviour with onPartJointBreak  events.

If a part is decoupled from a Vessel and that Vessel has 1 or more landing gears (tested with SmallGearBay) then the event OnPartJointBreak is thrown for every  landing gear joint. Even if landing gear parts are not linked with the parts decoupled.

I'm thinking that this can be an issue.
